job_tasks.phrase: ontwerpen, ontwikkelen en optimaliseren van nieuwe AI-oplossingen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the creation and refinement of AI solutions, which falls under the scope of model development and optimization.
Integrating AI solutions into existing business processes implies software development tasks, such as building APIs and connecting systems.

job_tasks.phrase: implementeren van GenAI technologie in de bedrijfsprocessen van onze klanten
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the need to understand client business processes to effectively implement GenAI technology.
Explicitly mentions collaboration with different teams.
Directly refers to communication with stakeholders.

job_tasks.phrase: Continu blijven leren en ontwikkelen op het gebied van AI-technologie n en -methoden
job_tasks.justification: Highlights the importance of continuous learning and development in AI technologies.

soft_skills.phrase: Continu blijven leren en ontwikkelen op het gebied van AI-technologie n en -methoden

classification.rationale: The job description explicitly mentions implementing GenAI technology, designing, developing, and optimizing AI solutions, and integrating them into business processes. While it also includes collaboration and communication, the core focus is on the application and development of GenAI, aligning with the definition of a GenAI Engineer.
